about.title: About Me
about.intro: Hello! I'm Paulo Rodrigues, a FullStack developer passionate about technology and innovation. With over 3 years of experience in web and mobile development. Currently, I work as a FullStack Developer at INNYX Educação and have the pleasure of transforming ideas into digital products that make a difference.
about.experience: My experience includes more than 20 delivered projects as a freelancer, working with companies from various segments and developing everything from landing pages to complex management and e-commerce systems.
about.linkBioDescription: to follow all my projects and news.

companies.title: Services Provided
companies.description: Companies that trusted my work to develop their digital solutions

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.description: My journey as a developer, contributing to innovative projects and technological solutions

innyx.title: FullStack Developer
innyx.description: FullStack Web & Mobile Developer | Innyx Educação
innyx.details: Currently working as a FullStack Developer at Innyx Educação, actively contributing to the creation and maintenance of scalable and high-performance web and mobile applications. I work daily with technologies like Vue.js, Next.js, PHP, Node.js, React Native (Expo) and Python, developing complete solutions, from feature conception to production delivery.
responsibilities: Development and maintenance of RESTful APIs and integrations between internal and external systems.
Implementation of modern and responsive interfaces focused on performance and user experience.
Application of Clean Code best practices and software architecture to ensure scalability and maintainability.
Working together with product and design teams to deliver efficient and user-centered solutions.
Continuous support and maintenance of internal systems and new projects, always seeking optimizations.
Active participation in code reviews, backlog planning and continuous improvements in the development flow.

encaixa.title: FullStack Developer
encaixa.description: At Encaixa.ai, I work as a developer responsible for transforming ideas into solid and efficient functionalities, contributing to the development and evolution of a modern platform centered on user experience.
responsibilities: Creation and development of web pages, focusing on performance, responsiveness and alignment with the application's identity.
Implementation of business rules based on functional and technical requirements, ensuring adherence to the product's strategic objectives.
Integration of payment solutions in the backend, ensuring security and fluidity in the transaction experience.
Development of RESTful APIs in Node.js, optimized for performance and easy maintenance.
Creation of endpoints dedicated to webhooks, enabling effective communication between external and internal systems.

freelance.title: Freelance web developer
freelance.description: I work as a freelance developer with more than 20 successfully delivered projects, serving clients from various segments with personalized and efficient solutions. My experience ranges from developing complete applications from scratch to maintaining and evolving existing systems, always focusing on performance, usability and scalability.
freelance.details: Throughout this journey, I worked with a wide range of technologies and stacks, adapting the choice of tools to the specific needs of each project. Among them: JavaScript (Vue.js, React, Next.js), Node.js, PHP, Python, React Native, Expo, among others.
responsibilities: End-to-end development of web and mobile systems.
Creation of APIs, administrative panels, e-commerce, mobile applications and customized internal systems.
Direct customer service, requirements gathering and post-delivery follow-up.
Maintenance and optimization of legacy applications.
Application of clean code best practices, versioning (Git), testing and security.
Autonomous management of deadlines, scope and constant value delivery.

icts.title: Web developer
icts.description: Web Developer | Grupo ICTS – R&D Area
icts.details: I worked in the Research and Development (R&D) sector of Grupo ICTS, contributing directly to the creation and evolution of robust and scalable web solutions. I worked with a focus on innovation, delivery quality and development best practices.
responsibilities: Development of web applications using Angular, Java and Node.js stacks.
Creation and maintenance of RESTful APIs, ensuring fluid integration between systems and high performance in requests.
Construction of reusable and modular components in Angular, promoting standardization and code reuse in different parts of the system.
Use of PostgreSQL database, versioning with Git and containerization with Docker.
Active participation in multidisciplinary squads, using agile methodologies such as Scrum and Kanban for organization, planning and continuous value delivery.
Strong alignment with development best practices, documentation and code review.
icts.conclusion: This experience was fundamental for my technical and professional growth, especially in contexts that require scalability, teamwork and constant innovation.

services.title: Types of Services
services.description: I develop complete solutions for different business needs
